sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A catalogue of books in folio, consisting of fathers, Latin and English commentaries on the Bible, history, physick, &c. which will be sold by auction on Friday the 31th. of July, 1691: betwixt three and four in the afternoon, at Tom's Coffee-House adjoyning to Ludgate.
4 p.
Catalogues are distributed at Mr. Welds the Crown betwixt the Two Temple-Gates in Fleet-street, at Mr. Bennets in St. Paul's Church-Yard, at Mr. Manships the Bull against the Royal Exchange, and at the above-said Coffee-House., [London] : [1691]
Caption title. Place of publication suggested by Wing. Possibly a fragment: signed at foot D. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
A catalogue of books in folio, consisting of fathers, Latin and English commentaries on the Bible, history, physick, &c. which will be sold by auction on Friday the 31th. of July, 1691: betwixt three and four in the afternoon, at Tom's Coffee-House adjoyning to Ludgate.

Catalogues are distributed at Mr. Welds the Crown betwixt the Two Temple-Gates in Fleet-street, at Mr. Bennets in St. Paul's Church-Yard, at Mr. Manships the Bull against the Royal Exchange, and at the above-said Coffee-House., [London] : [1691]
